sentences.sContent: But we have the same problem in UK.
sentences.sContent_eng: But we have the same problem in UK.
sentences.sCn: 而在我们英国，也有同样的问题。

sentences.sContent: It is not known if they will return to the UK for the birth.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is not known if they will return to the UK for the birth.
sentences.sCn: 现在还不知道他们是否会为了孩子的出生而回到英国。
